resources.string: Da khpal app lapara yao icon aw num entekhab ka. Da ba staso pa home screen bandi da shakaridalo tarika badla ki.
FadCam app da FadSec Lab suite yo hissa da. Nur maloomat da paara, laandi \'Source Code ogorai\' bandi click kai.

FadCam yao ad-free, open-source video recording app da che privacy ta tarjeeh warkawi aw sta data na track kai aw na ye jama kai. Da sirf pa GitHub aw pa README ke che kam official links di, sirf alta dastiyab de.

FadCam pa mashhoor YouTube channels bandi feature shawe de, agha ke HowToMen aw Xtream Droid shamil di, aw da GrapheneOS aw 55+ nor articles ki ham feature shwe de.
Community join kae, madad, ideas share kawalo, aw mustaqbil app updates da paara

\n Dumra Zay shta:
%.2f GB / %.2f GB

Da Record wakh (andaza):
FHD: %s
HD: %s
SD: %s

Ter shawi wakh:
%02d:%02d
Paati wakh:
%s \n

string-array.name: tips_widget
string-array.item: 1/11 | Preview bandi ogad tap okai che band shi.
2/11 | Date widget bandi ogad tap okai che clock display ogorai.
3/11 | Storage widget pa realtime ki recording space update kai.
4/11 | Stats widget videos aw istemal shawe space khai.
5/11 | Video quality (HD, SD, FHD) pa settings ke badlede shi.
6/11 | Kam space de? Video quality kam kai zyat recording wakh da paara.
7/11 | Settings ki watermark add kai.
8/11 | Exact location acholo la settings ki option ogorae.
9/11 | Makhi wala camera na record kol di? Settings ki select kae.
10/11 | Da app preferences save kigi aw agha pakhpala apply kigi.
11/11 | Madad pakar de? About ki Discord link shte alta na join kae.

resources.string:
\n Videos: %d
Istemal shawe Zay: %s \n
Watermark option intikhab kai\n(Default: Timestamp sara da FadCam)
Oke zar video save kol we, nu \'No Watermark\' intekhab kae. Watermark am add kol gware? Nu byam hes khabara nada, bs lag wakh ba der akhli!
Da location data am watermark ki shamil kae. \nGPS pehla zaruri on kol de \n(Default: Disabled)
Da Phone GPS enable kae, da latitude aw longitude data watermark ke shaamil kolo dapara.

string-array.name: easter_eggs_array
string-array.item: Oo! Dalta nashi ratlay. Recording shuru ka pehla che access darkam.
Ta yo khaas button omuntalo! kho da sam nakai lol
Zarrr sha! Sta system alutoo wala de… ya kideshi sirf recording shuru kolo sara theek shi.
Asi, ajeeba kas ye yara…
Sta da Bugatti kam rung de?
Za de dapara na ym program shwe sa che rasara ta ke lagya. Yo minute, ta ma hack ke kho na?

string-array.name: questions_array
string-array.item: DISCLAIMER
FadCam da user data jama kai zan sara?
Di app ki ishtehar am shta?
FadCam da location access wali gwari?
FadCam internet sara am connect kegi?
Hes runga data pa external servers bande store kegi?
Zama videos sara sa kegi record kolo na pas?
FadCam zama data third party services ta legi?
General
Da watermarking dumra der wakh wali akhli?
Da \'temp\' num wala video sa shae de?
Za video quality sanga badlole sham?
Za da preview video band kole sham?
Za location sanga pa watermark ki achole sham?
Zama preferences de app ki save kegi?
Za scheduled recordings kole sham?
Da app za sanga update kole sham?

string-array.name: answers_array
string-array.item: FadCam hes am ghair akhlaqi ya illegal istemal la nade. Misuse, da cha surveillance ya privacy ki da dakhal, zamung da guidelines khilaf di. Da de app authors hes qisam am misuse jawabgar na di.
Na, FadCam hes kisam user data na jama kai.
Na, FadCam bilkul ad-free dai.
Da location info watermark ke shaamil kawalo dapara.
Na, FadCam internet sara connect na dai.
Na, tola data sta pa device bandi store kigi.
Sta videos sta pa device ki internal app storage ke save kigi.
Na, FadCam da data share ya jamakol na kai.
Watermark har frame ke shaamil kigi. Ogad video we nu, zyat wakh ba akhli.
\'Temp\' video sta asli recording dai. Da watermarking process na pas pakhpala delete kigi. Oke watermarking fail she, no \'temp\' file backup pa tor bandi prot we.
Video quality settings ke badal kideshi: HD, SD, or FHD.
Preview wala zay bandi, disable kawalo dapara, long press okai.
Location settings ke enable kae, che watermark ke da location data shaamil she. Da precise longitude aw latitude data shaamil kai.
Ao, preferences aw tol settings save kegi ao pakhpala apply kigi.
Da feature ba bad ki razi, In Sha Allah.
Updates dapara, official GitHub repo check kae.

resources.string: Zaruri khabara: Da app la development ki de. Nawi features wakh sara add kegi.

• New UI design
• Videos now save internally in the app
• Option to save videos to gallery
• Customizable watermarking
• ExoPlayer integration for better playback
• Location data in watermarks
• Dynamic watermark options
• Long press feedback with animations
• Date and Time widget customization

• Auto-scheduled recordings 
• Auto-uploading to Google Drive 
• Custom app icons 
• App lock for enhanced privacy 
• In-app video editor for simple tasks like trimming 
• And many more exciting features!
Video save kolo ke fail shwa
Ya darust position nade ya video list null dai
Pa rishtiya da video delete kol gwari?
Ta pa rishtya gware che da video(s) da safae hasti na mitao kam? 🚀💥
Di app ta da location permission zarurat dai, location data videos ke shaamil kolo la. Mehrbani oka ao permission warka warla.
Stasu pehla na latest version bandi de.
Yo nawe version (%1$s) milaoshu. Update kolo dapara, F-Droid store ya GitHub repository na download kae.
Ta tol videos delete kol gware?
Theme badal sho. Tabdili tatbiq kegi...
Da app launcher icon aw num badal ka

Khpal videos pa PIN lock sara da Records tab ke masoon ka. \nSta amniyat da para, kala che app background ta zy ya band shi, Records tab ba automatic lock kegi. Kala che bewapas razy, no ta ba byaa unlock kaway
PIN pa bryalitob sara jor sho
PIN pa bryalitob sara lere sho
Da Tab Lock faalolo lapara PIN tasdiq ka
Da Tab Lock ghair faalolo lapara PIN tasdiq ka
Da lereko lapara PIN tasdiq ka
Ke mujud wi, khas lens entekhab ka masalan Wide Angle Lens\n(Default: Asli (0))
Yawa asli shaa camera paidaa shwa

Bitrate da video kaifiyat aw file size control kawi. Zyat = kha kaifiyat, khaw loy files. Dera zyat ya der kam kole da recording problems ya kharab kaifiyat jor kole shi. Da toseya shwy range sta pa device aw entekhab shwi resolution bandi takia lari. Da default qimat porta sta pa osani tanzimato bandi bina de.
Khabardar: Bitrate der kam de. Da video kaifiyat kharab kegi.
Khabardar: Bitrate der zyat de. Recording nalakam kegi ya device garm kegi.
Bitrate pa toseya shwi range ke de.
Nagalai bitrate. Meharbaani wka da %1$d aw %2$d Mbps pa maniz ke yaw qimat dakhel ka.
Bitrate pa bryalitob sara save sho.
Bitrate pa default bandi reset sho.

Bitrate da video pa har second ke karowono da malumato miqdar de. Zyat bitrate matlab de kha kaifiyat khaw loy files. Der zyat ya der kam kole mishkil jor kegi. Default qimatuna pa maslaqi camera standarduno bandi bina di.
Da khpalo videogano lapara samt entekhab ka. Portrait (walaro) da social media lapara kha de; Landscape (paltano) da YouTube, presentations aw gharo lapara kha de.

Pa automatic dol recordings pa waro waro files ke taqsimawi (Default: Ghair faal). Tawsia shwy: 2 GB da twazun lapara. Da 4 GB pore options aw custom sizes shta. Da da loya recordings management ke aw da device file size limit na tadbiqi ke madad kawai.
Pa Videogano ke Mawqeiyat Shamil Ka
Pa video metadata ke GPS coordinates shamilol (geotags). \nGPS faal pakar de \n(Default: Ghair Faal)
Da mawqeiyat malumaat pa negh pa video files ke shamilegi, kole da gallery/map apps le khole shi owe warshayi che video cherta akhestale shwai de.
Ejazat werkawal sho! Os ta kole shi da mawqeiyat khasiyatuna pa tanzimato ke faal ka.
Sta videogano ta da GPS coordinates shamilolo lapara da mawqeiyat ejazat pakar de. Da dé khasiyat karawalo lapara meharbaani wka ejazat werka.
Da videogano lapara da audio sabtol faal ya ghair faal ka.\n(Default: Faal)
Da audio sabtolo lapara kom microphone karegi entekhab ka. Ke wired mic wasal na wi, automatic ba da telefon mic karol kegi.
Wired mic paidaa na sho. Da telefon mic karol kegi.
Nadurust bit rate. Da 64000 aw 384000 tar minz qimat dakhil ka.
Nadurust sampling rate. 44100 ya 48000 dakhil ka.
Da ghora kaifiyat lapara da ghag bit rate aw sampling rate tanzim ka. Default: 192000 bps, 48000 Hz, Stereo.

• Bit Rate (bps) da ghag kaifiyat aw da file size control kawi. Lwar qimatuna kha kaifiyat magar lwae files maning lari. 192000 da aksar karolo lapara yaw kha default de. • Sampling Rate (Hz) har second ke da tso zala ghag akhestelo shmair de. 48000 Hz da video lapara standard de, 44100 Hz da ghag lapara aam de.
Tawsiya shwee: 192000 bps, 48000 Hz da aksar karwonko lapara.
Da debug log file jorolo faal ka \n(Default: Ghair Faal)
Kala che faal shi, yaw debug log file ba pa Downloads/FadCam folder ke jorol kegi. Da dé pa app problems ke madad kole shi.
Pa Raatluky Sho Ke Onboarding Warshayi
Faal ka che pa raatluky karazan ke da FadCam da app pezhandana aw ejazat larshowuna wuwiny.
Pa Sho Ke Automatic Update Check
Ke faal wi, FadCam ba har kala che ta app kholé update check kawi. Da automatic update check band kolo lapara dé ghair faal ka.\n(Default: On)
Ka zakhira kawal chi videos cherta sakli.
Khoso Zai (SD Card/Nor, Da Gallery La Khwaa Katey Kegi)
Yadawana: Da khoso zai karwal videos noro app ta kesheena kedole shi (masalan, Gallery). Dakhili zakhira videos yawazi FadCam ta private sati.
Meharbaani wka da naway recording shoroo kolo na wrandy yaw lahza sabr wka
د دوام لپاره ښي خواته وښويئ
خپله خوښه د ایپ ژبه غوره کړئ.
او ستاسو لپاره جوړ شوی - نه د اعلان ورکوونکو لپاره.
تاسو کولای شئ دا وروسته په تنظیماتو کې بدل کړئ.
FadCam د ویډیو ثبتولو او ساتلو لپاره ستاسو کامرې، مایکروفون، او زېرمتون ته لاسرسي ته اړتیا لري.
د دوام لپاره تاسو باید ټولې اجازې ورکړئ.
د بیټرۍ آپټیمایزيشن غیر فعاله کړئ
تصدیق کړئ که تاسو انسان یاست
هممم... سمه ده. دا قواعد غیر قابل مذاکره دي. که تاسو نشئ منلی، مهرباني وکړئ FadCam همدا اوس له منځه یوسئ.
زه به FadCam د کوم قانون ماتولو، د چا محرمیت ته تېری کولو، یا د عجیبه کارونو لپاره نه کاروم. که چېرې زه غلطي وکړم، د پروګرام جوړوونکی مسؤل نه دی. (دا زما مسؤلیت دی).
زه لا له کارولو مخکې له FadCam سره مینه لرم. (اختیاري نه دی)
Ta darto video record kai nedi
Da FadCam lapara da liray control zur razee.

Da QR code pa mreshta sara FadCam clients jora ka da secure, mahali network control lapara: record shoro/band kawalo, preview, zoom, camera switch kawalo, aw nor dher - tol da end-to-end encryption sara.
%1$d zorani items pa khpala delete shwal.
Da delete kawalo lapara kho item neshta.
%1$d items pa daimi tawga delete shwal.
Da items pa delete kawalo ki ghalati.
Aya yaqin lari che %1$d khwakharai items pa daimi tawga delete kai? Da kar na badlolai kedai shi.
Aya yaqin lari che tol items pa daimi tawga delete kai? Da kar na badlolai kedai shi.
Kho item na day khwakharai shwai.
%1$d items da public Downloads/FadCam/ folder ta berta restore sho?
Da items pa berta restore kawalo ki ghalati. Shaied dzini files restore na shi ya gallery update na shi. Da app storage permissions check ka.
